China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ 2024 年 3 月 5 日星期二 11:06:10 GMT 120
Taiwan urges dialogue with China without political preconditionsTaiwan's Mainland Affairs Council on Tuesday urged China to accept the fact that the two sides are not subordinate to each other, after Beijing hardened its stance on the island in a government work report. Tue, 05 Mar 2024 08:46:36 GMT O36HPGLUJFMQVGET72KSP7H73M https://www.reuters.com/world/taiwan-urges-dialogue-with-china-without-political-preconditions-2024-03-05/Reuters世界
European shares fall over underwhelming Chinese stimulus, data on tapEuropean shares opened lower on Tuesday, tracking weaker Asian equities, as pledges by China to transform its economy amid stuttering growth failed to impress investors, while markets grew cautious ahead of a string of euro zone and U.S. economic data. Tue, 05 Mar 2024 08:16:50 GMT 2CUHYWQQZFIMZFAYM2LVHG7PM4 https://www.reuters.com/markets/europe/european-shares-fall-over-underwhelming-chinese-stimulus-data-tap-2024-03-05/Reuters市场欧洲市场
Germany's Schaeffler misses expectations for 2023 core profitGerman automotive and industrial supplier Schaeffler AG reported full-year adjusted core profit (EBIT) of 1.19 billion ($1.29 billion) on Tuesday, weighed down by weak demand in China for the group's Industrial division. Tue, 05 Mar 2024 08:05:38 GMT 3AEDHVYV3BOHVPL4WODZWQ4QOM https://www.reuters.com/business/germanys-schaeffler-misses-expectations-2023-core-profit-2024-03-05/Reuters商业
Philippines, US to hold military drills in islands facing South China Sea, TaiwanThe Philippines and the United States will carry out annual military exercises next month in key locations including Philippine islands facing the South China Sea and Taiwan, as tensions with China in the region continue to simmer. Tue, 05 Mar 2024 07:49:33 GMT 2GF3RDBITZJU7LLHTQKC5TFC4A https://www.reuters.com/world/philippines-us-hold-military-drills-islands-faceing-south-china-sea-taiwan-2024-03-05/Reuters世界
Japan says China's rapidly rising military power 'serious concern'Japanese Chief Cabinet Secretary Yoshimasa Hayashi said on Tuesday that China's rapidly expanding military power was a "serious concern" for Japan and the international society. Tue, 05 Mar 2024 07:26:05 GMT DROPLFJ6OROG3GT5EIGVJF3474 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/japan-says-chinas-rapidly-rising-military-power-serious-concern-2024-03-05/Reuters世界亚太地区
Investors in China stick to bargains as fiscal bazooka proves elusiveForeign investors returning to China's recuperating stock markets say spending plans announced on Tuesday are not enough to turn battered sentiment around, and the main reason to keep buying shares for now is because they are cheap. Tue, 05 Mar 2024 07:20:54 GMT 5JZHL5GQ2RPAPIBHZRSV7VYUUI https://www.reuters.com/markets/asia/investors-china-stick-bargains-fiscal-bazooka-proves-elusive-2024-03-05/Ankur Banerjee, Tom Westbrook市场亚洲市场
